commit.message: Change all buttons that have state based text into static text

Enforce static button text with disabled state and toast feedback

- Update app requirements to prohibit dynamic button text changes
- Button loading states now indicated solely through disabled styling (opacity, cursor, pointer events)
- Add toast confirmations for form submissions across all admin forms
- Apply consistent pattern to ProductForm, CategoryForm, CollectionForm, and InlineEditField
- Improves UX by eliminating layout reflow and providing clear feedback via toasts
Use ShadCN tables instead of html elements

Migrate product pricing to variants-only model

- Remove price, stemLength, and countPerBunch fields from Product model
- Create explicit InspirationSetProduct join table with variant support
- Update ProductForm to manage variants instead of base product fields
- Update ProductCard and ProductConfigurator with variant selectors
- Simplify Cart component by removing variant switching (variant required)
- Update shop filters to query variants table for stem lengths
- Update admin components (AdminProductCard, CollectionForm, ProductMultiSelect) for variant-based pricing
- Run Prisma migrations to update database schema
Update terminology in admin content management pages

Fix product page

Fix page reloading issue, organize product listings, and update inspiration images

Update image paths and rename asset folders

Standardized image paths in seed data and Cart component to use /categories and /products directories instead of /featured-categories and /featured-products. Renamed and moved image assets accordingly for better organization. Updated peakblooms logo image.

Add admin content management and API endpoints

Introduces admin pages for managing products, categories, and collections, including create, edit, and list views. Adds API routes for CRUD operations on products, categories, and inspiration sets (collections). Updates the admin dashboard to provide access to new management sections. Refactors authentication checks and improves UI components for inline editing and management actions. Minor UI improvements to sign-in and sign-up forms.

Add cart UI with variant selection and API updates

Implements a full shopping cart UI with quantity and variant selection, including optimistic updates and debounced API calls. Adds a new API route to fetch product variants, updates the cart item PATCH API to support variant changes, and adjusts cart count logic to count unique items. Also introduces a reusable debounced callback hook and improves admin navigation and shop filter UI.

Refactor auth, cart, and UI for server-side logic and UX

Migrates authentication and authorization checks in cart and orders pages to server-side redirects for improved security and SSR. Adds cart count badge to navigation, refactors product card to show pricing/specs per user state, and updates add-to-cart buttons to use toast notifications and router methods. Shop filters now fetch options server-side and display as a horizontal bar on desktop. Adds badge UI component and documents app requirements and standards.

Update branding and improve shop/filter UI

Updated page metadata titles to 'Peak Blooms' branding and improved shop layout with sidebar filters. Refined ProductConfigurator sign-in messaging and streamlined ShopFilters desktop UI. Updated favicon and logo assets.

Refactor shop page and filters to use server-side data and Radix UI Label

Migrates the shop page to server-side data fetching with Prisma, replacing client-side hooks and API calls. Updates ShopFilters to use the new Label component from Radix UI, improves filter value handling, and adjusts Select component styles for consistency. Adds a reusable Label UI component and refines Select UI styles.

Add 'use client' directive to ProductConfigurator

Added the 'use client' directive to ProductConfigurator.tsx to ensure it is treated as a client component. Also removed unused imports from shop/[slug]/page.tsx for code cleanup.

Add product filtering by color, stem length, and price

Introduces filtering options for products by color, stem length, and price in the shop page and API. Adds a new ShopFilters component, updates Prisma schema and migration to support color, and refactors product API routes to handle new filter parameters.

Add product image preview to inspiration table

Introduces a new 'Image' column to the products table on inspiration pages, displaying a small preview image for each product or a placeholder if no image is available. Also updates TODO.md to reflect progress and new tasks.

Refactor admin user management to use server components

Migrates admin user listing and authorization checks to server components, fetching users directly from the database. Extracts user card UI into ApprovedUserCard and PendingUserCard components for better separation of concerns. Updates redirect logic for admin routes and simplifies approval/rejection flows.

Add admin navigation with settings icon for admins

Introduces an admin link in the navigation bar for users with the ADMIN role, using a new IconSettings component. Updates icon exports to include IconSettings and removes a completed admin redirect TODO.

Improve admin access flow and session handling

Adds a server-side redirect handler for admin users after sign-in, refines unauthorized admin page to show different actions for signed-in and unsigned users, and ensures session data is refreshed from the database for accurate role and approval status. Removes unused proxy middleware and updates layout and page containers for consistency.
